## Load Libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```

## Load Data set

```{r}
camera <-read.csv("GDE Wildlife Camera Trap Image Processing  - DATA.csv")
```

## Analysis

```{r}
#Summarize count of each bird species found at each site
cameracount <- camera %>%
  group_by(Location.Code, Species, Camera.Start.Date) %>%
  summarise(Count = n()) %>%
  ungroup()
```

## **Trap RAI**

Calculate RAI

RAI = \# occurrences/# days in operation

```{r}
TrapRAI <- cameracount |> 
  mutate(RAI = Count/3)
```

```{r}
TrapRAI |> 
  ggplot(aes(y = RAI, x = Camera.Start.Date, color = Location.Code)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  facet_wrap(Location.Code ~. )
```
